title: Create IMAGE-is-prime-image-of-node Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›is-prime-image-of-node‹ is created when the provided IDs of the IMAGE and NODE are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* An IMAGE cannot be connected to itself. -> Status Code \`422\`
* An IMAGE cannot be connected to another IMAGE. -> Status Code \`422\`
* The same ›is-prime-image-of-node‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each IMAGE can be in a ›is-prime-image-of-node‹ relationship with multiple NODES of the same type.
* Each IMAGE can be in a ›is-prime-image-of-node‹ relationship with multiple NODES of different types.
